messages.message:
Have we given any thought for customer to be able to retrieve files post split-classification
Customer would want to use Split-classification to processes specific files.
Being able to retrieve the split-file(s) from the platform would be helpfull
Hm its a good point. Do we have specific use cases here? Is this more for downstream ?

It's important for Natwest,
It makes sense for all split classification usecases, VRSF is also running split-simplification and using those files down stream

Customers often want to create records of there documents, and this would be post split-classification
Got it will create a ticket for this
